name: Day Planner
description: Keep track of your daily tasks by the hour, 9am to 6pm. Uses jQuery and Moment.js.

name: README Generator
description: Simplify your workflow. Easily generate a README file using Node.js and Inquirer NPM package.

name: Team Generator
description: Select from Manager, Engineer, or Intern and build your team. App utilizes Object-Oriented Programming, Prototypes and Class Constructors.

name: Note-Taker
description: Take Notes. Save Notes. Get Notes. App posts to and requests notes from server using Express NPM package.

name: Eat-Da-Burger
description: MVC Controller. Order a burger. Eat that Burger. App utilizes MVC, Node.js and Express Handlebars.

name: Employee Tracker
description: Add, Edit, Delete: Employees, Roles, Departments. App utilizes Node.js, MySQL and CRUD methods.

name: Project You
description: Log hours of sleep, fluid-intake, and hours of exercise. App utilizes Node.js, Express Handlebars, MySQL, Passport. This was a collaborative project.

name: Employee-Directory
description: Write a description for this app.
